text: Birthday Girl is a 2001 British-American crime-thriller movie. It is set in St Albans, Hertfordshire. It stars Nicole Kidman and Ben Chaplin. It is a bank clerk in St Albans who finds a Russian mail-order bride, Nadia, played by Kidman. The movie received mixed reviews. == Other websites == * Category:2001 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Hertfordshire Category:Multilingual movies
title: Birthday Girl
